title: [Large-Scale] Critical Thinking-Based Argument Mapping Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education theories and fundamental lesson design concepts
context.additional_context: Interaction-centered activities using digital devices, fostering small-group collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Visualize argumentation structures in science education with over 80% accuracy using the CAAM tool
Revise and improve logical fallacies in argument mapping by 70% or more through peer feedback
Develop three or more teaching-learning activities incorporating critical thinking elements in science lesson design
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
